abilities.desc: After you take damage from an Action, you deal 1 damage to each enemy that dealt damage to you. If that enemy holds your Challenge, you deal 2 damage to them instead.
abilities.trigger: after you take damage from an action

actions.name: Slugfest
actions.desc:
Move 1, then Challenge an enemy within range, then they deal 1 damage to you.
Usable once per turn
